welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Krommenie! This charming Dutch town is known for its picturesque canals, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our unique culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving mainly European and intercontinental flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Schiphol Airport, mainly used for flights within Europe.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A modern and spacious terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving mainly intercontinental flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a limit of 4 hours per device.
